subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=jiáo,jué,jiào
|m_note=jiáo - vernacular; jué - literary; jiào - only used in {{zh-l|*倒嚼}}, {{zh-l|*反嚼}} or {{zh-l|*回嚼}}
|m-s=jiao2
|c=zoek3,zoek6,ziu6,zeu6
|c_note=zoek3/zoek6 - literary; ziu6/zeu6 - vernacular (also written as {{zh-l|*噍}} or {{zh-l|*𡁻}})
|c-t=diak2,diau5
|c-t_note=diak2 - literary; diau5 - vernacular (also written as {{zh-l|*噍}})
|g=qioh7
|h=pfs=chiok/chheu;gd=jiog5/qiau4
|h_note=chiok/jiog5 - literary; chheu/qiau4 - vernacular (also written as {{zh-l|*噍}})
|j=jiau1
|md=ciŏk
|mn=xm,zz:chio̍h/qz,tw:chia̍uh/qz:chhia̍uh/ml:chio̍k/tw:chiok
|mn_note=chio̍h/chia̍uh/chhia̍uh - vernacular; chio̍k/chiok - literary
|mn-t=ziag4
|w=5xxiaq
|x=zio6/cio4
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|嚼用|嚼舌|味同嚼蠟|嚼墨噴紙|屠門大嚼|嚼旃|嚼咬人|嚼菜根|嚼齒|嚼子|咬釘嚼鐵|嚼裹兒|亂嚼舌頭|嚼蛆|倒嚼|嚼穀|嚼舌頭|咀英嚼華|大吃大嚼|嚼舌根|嚼說|嚼蠟|咬嚼|咀嚼肌|咀嚼|咬文嚼字|混嚼舌根|死吃死嚼|摶沙嚼蠟|白嚼人|朵頤大嚼|白嚼蛆|沒嚼頭|望門大嚼|細嚼慢嚥|細嚼|臭嚼|裂眥嚼齒}}
